sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu"> <x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <ghana_padamu> yā tē̍-tē̍ yā-yā tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠-hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ tē̍ yā-yā tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠** tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠-hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ tē̍-tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍-hastē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ tē̍-tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍** hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍-hastē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠-hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍-ba̠bhūva̍ hastē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠-hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍** hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍-ba̠bhūva̍ hastē̍-hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠-tē̠ ba̠bhūva̍ hastē̍-hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠** ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠-tē̠ ba̠bhūva̍-ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ-dhanu̍ḥ tē̠ ba̠bhūva̍-ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ** tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ-dhanu̍ḥ tē̠-tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠-vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ dhanu̍ḥ tē̠-tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠** dhanu̍ḥ vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠-vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ dhanu̍ḥ-dhanu̍ḥ vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ pari̍bbhuja-pari̍bbhuja vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ dhanu̍ḥ-dhanu̍ḥ vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ pari̍bbhuja** vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ pari̍bbhuja-pari̍bbhuja vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ ** pari̍bbhuja** ** </ghana_padamu> <name>  yā tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍ ba̠b</name> <order>12</order> <padamu display_value="Sri Rudram">a79e9faec327461049521d12b4013105</padamu> <padamustring>  yā tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ । tayā̠-'smān, vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ pari̍bbhuja </padamustring> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-07-25 16:24:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8b65bbe6c363021049521d12b40131c7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-07-25 16:24:31</sys_updated_on> <word_list>yā tē̍ hē̠tirmī̍ḍuṣṭama̠ hastē̍ ba̠bhūva̍ tē̠ dhanu̍ḥ vi̠śvata̠stvama̍ya̠kṣmayā̠ pari̍bbhuja </word_list> </x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu> </record_update>
